modmenu.descriptionTranslation.${mod_id}: Client-Side Fabric mod that allows the player to try bhop from the Source engine.
sourcehop.text.option.general.enableCrou: Gives a small extra jump height when crouching.
sourcehop.text.option.general.enableSpee: Enables a speedometer to display current speed.
sourcehop.text.option.general.enableJesu: Allows you to bhop on water and lava.
sourcehop.text.option.properties.airacce: Acceleration when moving in the air.
sourcehop.text.option.properties.maxairs: Maximum speed you can move in air without influence. Also determines how quickly you gain speed during a jump.
sourcehop.text.option.properties.maxSpee: How much to multiply the default movement speed.
sourcehop.text.option.properties.crouchj: How much to multiply the jump power when crouching.
sourcehop.text.option.properties.gravity: Strength of the default gravity in the game.
